_comment: Realistic AI development model - separating code generation from total development time

debugging_testing.reason: Finding and fixing bugs, edge cases

ai_generation_speed.reality_check: AI generates code 1440x faster than humans write it

reason_1.title: Coding is only 20% of development
reason_1.explanation: If AI does coding 1440x faster, but coding is 20% of work, max savings is 20%

reason_2.title: AI-generated code needs review/debugging
reason_2.explanation: Every AI-generated line must be read, understood, tested, debugged

reason_3.title: AI makes mistakes
reason_3.explanation: Hallucinations, incorrect logic, security issues, performance problems
reason_3.time_cost: Debug time can exceed coding time for complex features

reason_4.title: Context limits
reason_4.explanation: AI can't hold entire large codebase, loses coherence across files
reason_4.impact: More manual integration work for projects >5K lines

reason_5.title: Iterative refinement
reason_5.explanation: Requirements change, AI output needs multiple iterations

step_2_design.comment: AI suggests architectures but human decides

step_3_coding.comment: AI writes code fast BUT human must prompt/review

step_4_debugging.comment: AI helps debug but creates new bugs too

total.comment: Overall ~30-35% time saved for typical project

pure_boilerplate.description: CRUD endpoints, basic forms, simple REST APIs
pure_boilerplate.why: High % of work is coding, AI excels at boilerplate

complex_business_logic.why: More design/debug time, AI makes logic errors

distributed_systems.why: Heavy integration/debugging, AI lacks system understanding

expert_domains.description: ML models, video processing, low-level optimization

easy_tech_1_3.comment: AI trained on tons of examples

hard_tech_7_8.comment: AI makes more mistakes, needs more review

expert_tech_9_10.comment: AI often wrong, human must rewrite

small_0_5k.comment: AI can see everything, minimal coherence issues

medium_5k_20k.comment: Some coherence issues, more integration work

xlarge_50k_plus.comment: Major coherence issues, heavy human integration

where.base_speedup: From task type (0.25 for boilerplate to 0.85 for expert)
where.tech_multiplier: From technology difficulty (0.8 for easy to 2.0 for expert)
where.size_multiplier: From project size (1.0 for small to 1.6 for xlarge)

safety_bounds.reason: Never claim >85% time saved or <5% time saved

simple_todo_app.why: Small, simple, boilerplate - AI's sweet spot

twitter_clone.why: Medium project, standard tech, some integration complexity

youtube_clone.why: Large codebase, complex video processing, heavy integration

kubernetes_ml_platform.why: Expert tech, distributed complexity, AI makes many mistakes

key_insights.insight_1: AI code generation is 0.07% of human time, but coding is only 20% of development
key_insights.insight_2: Review + debug of AI code takes 30-50% as long as AI generation
key_insights.insight_3: Integration across files is mostly human work, especially for large projects
key_insights.insight_4: Technology difficulty affects AI accuracy more than generation speed
key_insights.insight_5: Overall speedup: 15-80% depending on task type, tech stack, and project size
